channel.title: [508] How to play music?
channel.description: Well I recently decided to try setup my own 508 server and i was happy to see sounds worked , so did music on the main menu, i was wondering if there is anyway for me to get more runescape music in game or my own music at least? Also if there is a way can someone tell me how :D? Thanks in advance

item.title: [508] How to play music?
item.dc:creator: @Nuke207 Nuke207
item.description:
@Nuke207 wrote:

by library you mean dll right?
Anyway what i mean is maybe like any wav music or something (though wav files are quite large I think).
Sorry if this is a really nubby question

Read full topic

item.title: [508] How to play music?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Nuke207, post:5, topic:237414”]the music could be change-able
like theres a music folder and any of some music format in it get detected and played
since I’m not a 1337 coder i really have no idea how to do that :([/quote]
I don’t think there’s one Java library which will play all forms of audio files, which means for each file type you will need a new library.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] How to play music?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

I’m not a fan of the inbuilt music players, all they add is file size. Almost everyone here has an audio player, probably 99% of them is iTunes. I have Amarok, but it all works the same. I don’t see why you need them, seeing as most likely the developer of that client likes different music to you.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] How to play music?
item.dc:creator: @Nuke207 Nuke207
item.description:
@Nuke207 wrote:

Because i like to have music while playing and i am asking HOW to , sorry thats what i was meant to say :\ I’ll edit original post
